mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yisheng_guahao_uuid_number as yishengGuahaoUuidNumber ,a.bingren_id as bingrenId ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.huafeijine as huafeijine ,a.yisheng_guahao_time as yishengGuahaoTime ,a.yisheng_guahao_types as yishengGuahaoTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
